how.title: HOW IT WORKS
how.subtitle: TPA Retail specializes in inventory financing deals based on sales contracts with TV home shopping networks in South Korea, a 18.7 trillion Korean won (KRW) market and growing. TPA historical returns range from 16-24% on investment.

items.title: Propose Product
items.text: A small or medium enterprise (SME) with an existing product applies to the TV network in the hopes of marketing their product to customers on a home shopping channel.

items.title: Receive Contract
items.text: Upon approval by the TV network, the SME will receive a sales contract stipulating the broadcast time and date, inventory requirements, terms of sale, and other conditions. The TV network will suggest TPA Holdings to the SME if they require financing, logistics, or other services.

items.title: Seek Loan
items.text: The SME will now take their approved sales contract to TPA Retail and apply for a loan. TPA Retail experts will review the business and market opportunity for the SME’s product and propose inventory financing terms for a loan up to 500 million KRW.

items.title: Due Diligence
items.text: In addition to evaluating the SME, TPA Retail will coordinate directly with the TV network partners to review the sales contract and negotiate the logistics of the loan and repayment conditions.

items.title: Receive Bond
items.text: As the financier of the deal, TPA Retail will receive a bond stipulating that sales revenues from the broadcast segment will be transferred to TPA Retail directly and not the SME until the loan principal and interest is paid back in full.

items.title: Submit Loan
items.text: Once all terms of the loan is finalized and all parties are signed and committed, TPA Retail will submit the terms of the loan to the TPA Pool smart contract on the Ethereum network.The terms will include the TPA tokens required as principle, the interest to be paid by the SME on the loan, and the schedule of repayment, among other details.

items.title: Receive TPA
items.text: The TPA Pool will release the required principal in TPA tokens to TPA Retail. The timer for repayment will officially begin at this point.

items.title: Purchase Goods
items.text: TPA Retail will liquidate the TPA tokens in order to pay the manufacturer directly for the inventory as well as TPA Logistics for warehousing and 3PL services.

items.title: Store Goods
items.text: The manufacturer will send inventory directly to one of the four logistics centers belonging to TPA Logistics. Products will be inspected for quality at the manufacturer and again when it is received at TPA Logistics.

items.title: Ship Goods
items.text: TPA Logistics will then be responsible for shipping the inventory to the TV Networks as needed.

items.title: Receive Revenue
items.text: After the shopping segment concludes according to the original broadcasting schedule, the TV home shopping networks will fulfill their bond and send the sales revenues to TPA Retail, minus their share according to the original sales contract with the SME.

items.title: Return Principal
items.text: TPA Retail will use these revenues to purchase TPA tokens and return the principal amount to the Loan Pool, as well as the extra tokens representing the interest that the SME owes on the loan.

items.title: Pay Investors
items.text: The loan at this point has been paid back successfully, so the TPA Pool smart contract will automatically pay out the interest to the TPA Holders in the form of a TPA token.

items.title: Pay SME
items.text: At this point, the SME will receive their share of the sales revenues, which is the remainder after the loan principle, interest, cost of goods sold, and marketing costs have all been deducted.

risks.title: DeFi and Investor Safety
risks.subtitle: Decentralized Finance (DeFi) technology introduces a new level of security and efficiency to an already-working lending model. The result is higher returns and lower risk, automated and protected by smart contracts and decentralization.

items.title: DeFi Security
items.text: The TPA Pool is a smart contract that automates payouts to TPA holders and is fully guaranteed by the Liquidity Reserve.

items.title: Real Collateral
items.text: All loans are fully collateralized by real-world inventory that can be sold through partnerships with South Korea’s largest TV shopping networks.

items.title: Proven Performance
items.text: TPA Holdings is a major corporation with key partnerships and diverse international capabilities, resulting in years of success with this model.

items.title: What sets isMedia’s NFT platform apart?
items.text:
isMedia, a publicly traded company (KOSDAQ) based in South Korea, is launching the next-generation of NFT platform that goes beyond any platform that exists today. Users will be able to mint, purchase, and trade NFTs as easily on mobile devices as they can on the web, thanks to UX/UI design work done by MetaLab (metalab.co). MetaLab is a world-famous design firm delivering industry-leading products for clients including Dapper Labs (NBA Top Shots, Genies), Gemini (Nifty Gateway), Coinbase, Slack, and more.

isMedia’s platform takes it a further step in functionality with the incorporation of DeFi and gamification features that will give NFTs true utility and functionality and make the platform “sticky” for users. In partnership with TPA Holdings, a global corporation with years of profitable experience with financial lending products, isMedia will be able to offer game-changing features such as NFT and DeFi lending pools, crowdfunding, indexes, derivatives, and more. In addition, gamified features such as user challenges, games, exclusive “drops”, and more will keep users engaged with the platform to earn rewards and up their rankings.

items.title: What is the TPA token?
items.text: The TPA token is a utility token used on the isMedia platform that enables the DeFi offerings, platform gamification, user governance, and more. The TPA token will be offered as a “reverse-ICO” or the tokenization of an existing and profitable business model, initially through the financial loan pools managed by TPA Holdings, a subsidiary business of isMedia.

items.title: What NFTs will be offered on the platform?
items.text: The platform will be unique in its offerings, particularly in the strength of its entertainment and game-industry NFTs. Major entertainment companies SM Entertainment and P Nation will pursue a joint venture with isMedia in order to offer exclusive NFTs offered by globally-recognized K-pop celebrities and more. Further partnerships will continue to be announced.

items.title: Will the platform accept credit card?
items.text: Yes. In order to be accessible to a mainstream audience and grow the platform to the next level, isMedia has partnered with a major credit card processing provider in order to accept credit card payments on the platform.
